entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria (Hartland)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 11:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except east 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
